content: **pattern corrected/updated july 2017 ** **this pattern won a hookalicious award from the clf bright versions purple pink lime turquoise shown in cascade yarns fixation worked on size f hook cream version shown in aunt lydia s fashion crochet blue versions shown in coats & clark lustersheen pink version shown in pisgah yarn & dyeing co increase cotton gloss worked double-strand yellow version shown in pisgah yarn & dyeing co increase rayon petalspun worked double-strand gold & burgundy versions in plymouth yarns 24k worked on size g hook
